item.description: The winter season is officially over on March 19th and with the first weekend of spring this year comes the 50th anniversary of an ever popular yearly apres ski event which celebrates the end of winter and coming of spring. This is always one of the most popular weekends at our house and in the Mt Washington Valley overall so sign up early! We will have a two night minimum to stay at the lodge and will contact you with details about lodging and Icy event packages when you RSVP here on Meetup. See everyone up north!
item.name: Winter Season Send Off
